This version is planned to only "fix existing bugs" and "unfinished tasks".
We need to improve the quality after a 3D rush in v3.6 and v3.7.

data.title: HTML5 -- Armature render bug in CANVAS mode
data.body: `Engine version: Cocos 2d-x v3.7` `Language: JS` `Test env: Chrome for mac Version 41.0.2272.101 (64-bit)` `Reproduce steps:` 1. create JS project and set "renderMode" : 2 2. create a Armature object 3. add some display object into this Armature object 4. run moveTo action with this Armature object 5. run in web browser with canvas mode, then some display object position is incorrect: Here is my test code: http://vdisk.weibo.com/s/u2pFxSLc_tXN

data.title: cocos 3.1无法使用NDK r10c，有解决方案吗？
data.body:
使用NDK r10c编译cocos 3.1时会报错，看上去是NDK r10c去除了一部分方法。
cocos2d-x/external/lua/lua/prebuilt/android/liblua.a(lauxlib.o):lauxlib.c:function luaL_loadfile: error: undefined reference to '__srget'

大家有同时使用cocos 3.1 + NDK 10c的解决方案吗？

data.title: Tiledmap display usually not correct
data.body:
This is tiledmap:
![tiled](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/7405315/8973613/5432b8c8-3699-11e5-8483-07d87320409a.PNG)

This is how cocos2d-x-3.6 displayed:
![cocos](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/7405315/8973617/68b184be-3699-11e5-994a-ffd51013c7eb.PNG)

cocos2dx 3.5, 3.6 both have this bug.

data.title: Issues with new scenes.
data.body:
So here's the deal:
1. I create a new scene and fetch inside it a layer with additional sprites and events.
2. One of these sprites has a physics body.
3. That precise sprite (with a physics body) doesn't appear in the scene when running the game, when I try to change its position (with a mouse event) it then appears.
4. Contact between that sprite and additional bullets sprites doesn't trigger any callback. (Bitmasks and category and testconactbitmask are all set up properly).
However all of these happens only when I create a new custom scene, if I edit directly the built-in "HelloWorld" scene then everything is alright (well, expect for physical contact callbacks which don't happen whatsoever).

Thing is, this is really starting to become annoying as I cannot continue with further projects unless I finish this one.

data.title: Sprite doesn't show after setting its Physics Body
data.body:
Here's my piece of code:
http://pastebin.com/tD1PnzNM

The "enemy" sprite doesn't appear if I set its PhysicsBody, the strange thing is that it happens only with that specific sprite.

milestone.title: v3.7.1
milestone.description:
This version is about to release with Cocos v2.3.2.
The core feature is Skeleton Animation support for Cocos Studio
It will provide Skeleton Animation for TimelineAction, its cpp/json parser, Lua/JS bindings,  web implementation.
